thread.section_title: Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small room, great stay
thread.title_full: Small room, great stay - Review of Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JÃ¼rg W
title: Small room, great stay
text:
For our family trip to Paris we booked a triple room for 2 nights. The size of the room is quite small, but the furniture is modern and well aranged. While staying in Paris you don't spend hours in the hotel room.
The staff was extremely friendly, the location close to the Arc de Triomphe with Metro access excellent.
Will stay there again on our next trip to Paris.
